recommended_degree: Manajemen Pemasaran, Komunikasi Digital dan Media, Ilmu Komunikasi (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
A Digital Marketing Intern will assist in creating social media content, scheduling posts, and supporting basic campaign activities. The intern will help monitor engagement, collect performance data, and conduct simple research on trends or competitors. They will also support the team in preparing visuals, writing short captions, and organizing digital marketing files. The intern is expected to work independently using their own laptop to complete daily tasks.

This role is suitable for students or fresh graduates in Marketing, Communication, Business, or related fields. Candidates should be familiar with social media platforms, have basic content-creation skills, and show creativity in developing ideas. Good communication, willingness to learn, attention to detail, and the ability to manage multiple tasks are important. Having a personal laptop to support work activities is required for this internship.
